titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary:
7/31/2007--Introduced.
Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.
